item.title: Barrows interface
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

[quote=“Tonic, post:3, topic:310479”][quote author=ownerjosh link=topic=406906.msg3006199#msg3006199 date=1256424042]
First off you need to make sure you download the spirits. Wait here we go >>>>>http://www.mediafire.com/?ywaykrbmmhj<<<<<

add these methods in if you do not have them

[quote]public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName)
{
Class9 dSprite = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
dSprite.anInt250 = i;
dSprite.anInt236 = i;
dSprite.anInt262 = 5;
dSprite.anInt217 = 1;
dSprite.anInt214 = 0;
dSprite.anInt220 = 20;
dSprite.anInt267 = 20;
dSprite.aByte254 = 0;
dSprite.anInt230 = 52;
dSprite.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = loadAscheriitSprite(j, spriteName);
dSprite.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = loadAscheriitSprite(k, spriteName);
}

public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int height, String s)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;
class9.anInt262 = 5;
class9.anInt217 = 1;
class9.anInt214 = 0;
class9.anInt220 = width;
class9.anInt267 = height;
class9.aByte254 = 0;
class9.anInt230 = 52;
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aString221 = s;
}

public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, String spriteName)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;
class9.anInt262 = 5;
class9.anInt217 = 1;
class9.anInt214 = 0;
class9.anInt220 = width;
class9.anInt267 = height;
class9.aByte254 = 0;
class9.anInt230 = 52;
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aString221 = s;
}[/quote]

Ok open up class22.java.

add these methods

public static void bb(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intbb = addDTab(2343); intbb.anIntArray240 = new int[11]; intbb.anIntArray241 = new int[11]; intbb.anIntArray272 = new int[11]; intbb.anIntArray240[0] = 2344; intbb.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intbb.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //Main sprite addSprite(2344, 0, 0, "mainframe"); //Control 2345 (0) intbb.anIntArray240[1] = 2345; intbb.anIntArray241[1] = 19; intbb.anIntArray272[1] = 169; //Image addSprite(2345, 0, 0, "guthan"); //Control 2346 (1) intbb.anIntArray240[2] = 2346; intbb.anIntArray241[2] = 17; intbb.anIntArray272[2] = 16; //Image addSprite(2346, 0, 0, "ahrim"); //Control 2347 (2) intbb.anIntArray240[3] = 2347; intbb.anIntArray241[3] = 471; intbb.anIntArray272[3] = 26; //Close button addCloseButton(2347, "x", 22, 23, "Close"); //Control 2348 (3) intbb.anIntArray240[4] = 2348; intbb.anIntArray241[4] = 421; intbb.anIntArray272[4] = 104; //Button addActionButton(2348, 72, 32, "Button Text", "KBD1"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 2349 (4) intbb.anIntArray240[5] = 2349; intbb.anIntArray241[5] = 420; intbb.anIntArray272[5] = 60; //Button addActionButton(2349, 72, 32, "Button Text", "KBD2"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 2350 (5) intbb.anIntArray240[6] = 2350; intbb.anIntArray241[6] = 149; intbb.anIntArray272[6] = 22; //Image addSprite(2350, 0, 0, "Dharok"); //Control 2351 (6) intbb.anIntArray240[7] = 2351; intbb.anIntArray241[7] = 139; intbb.anIntArray272[7] = 165; //Image addSprite(2351, 0, 0, "verac"); //Control 2352 (7) intbb.anIntArray240[8] = 2352; intbb.anIntArray241[8] = 400; intbb.anIntArray272[8] = 291; //Label addText(2352, "By ownerjosh", wid, 0, 0xFF9040); //Control 2353 (8) intbb.anIntArray240[9] = 2353; intbb.anIntArray241[9] = 305; intbb.anIntArray272[9] = 22; //Image addSprite(2353, 0, 0, "Karil"); //Control 2354 (9) intbb.anIntArray240[10] = 2354; intbb.anIntArray241[10] = 250; intbb.anIntArray272[10] = 155; //Image addSprite(2354, 0, 0, "torag"); //Added 10 controls. }

find aclass44 = aClass44
and under it add

bb(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);

Havn’t put any effort into this so dont say its shit its just for new people to add.

Picture.

[/quote]

Lol why do you have a “x” and a 'Decline" button?[/quote]
SO TRUE! lmao, btw the graphics suck!

Read full topic

[quote]public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName)

class9.anInt262 = 5;
class9.anInt217 = 1;

class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aString221 = s;
}

public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, String spriteName)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;
class9.anInt262 = 5;
class9.anInt217 = 1;
class9.anInt214 = 0;
class9.anInt220 = width;
class9.anInt267 = height;
class9.aByte254 = 0;

class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aString221 = s;
}[/quote]

Ok open up class22.java.

add these methods

public static void bb(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intbb = addDTab(2343); intbb.anIntArray240 = new int[11]; intbb.anIntArray241 = new int[11]; intbb.anIntArray272 = new int[11]; intbb.anIntArray240[0] = 2344; intbb.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intbb.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //Main sprite addSprite(2344, 0, 0, "mainframe"); //Control 2345 (0) intbb.anIntArray240[1] = 2345; intbb.anIntArray241[1] = 19; intbb.anIntArray272[1] = 169; //Image addSprite(2345, 0, 0, "guthan"); //Control 2346 (1) intbb.anIntArray240[2] = 2346; intbb.anIntArray241[2] = 17; intbb.anIntArray272[2] = 16; //Image addSprite(2346, 0, 0, "ahrim"); //Control 2347 (2) intbb.anIntArray240[3] = 2347; intbb.anIntArray241[3] = 471; intbb.anIntArray272[3] = 26; //Close button addCloseButton(2347, "x", 22, 23, "Close"); //Control 2348 (3) intbb.anIntArray240[4] = 2348; intbb.anIntArray241[4] = 421; intbb.anIntArray272[4] = 104; //Button addActionButton(2348, 72, 32, "Button Text", "KBD1"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 2349 (4) intbb.anIntArray240[5] = 2349; intbb.anIntArray241[5] = 420; intbb.anIntArray272[5] = 60; //Button addActionButton(2349, 72, 32, "Button Text", "KBD2"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 2350 (5) intbb.anIntArray240[6] = 2350; intbb.anIntArray241[6] = 149; intbb.anIntArray272[6] = 22; //Image addSprite(2350, 0, 0, "Dharok"); //Control 2351 (6) intbb.anIntArray240[7] = 2351; intbb.anIntArray241[7] = 139; intbb.anIntArray272[7] = 165; //Image addSprite(2351, 0, 0, "verac"); //Control 2352 (7) intbb.anIntArray240[8] = 2352; intbb.anIntArray241[8] = 400; intbb.anIntArray272[8] = 291; //Label addText(2352, "By ownerjosh", wid, 0, 0xFF9040); //Control 2353 (8) intbb.anIntArray240[9] = 2353; intbb.anIntArray241[9] = 305; intbb.anIntArray272[9] = 22; //Image addSprite(2353, 0, 0, "Karil"); //Control 2354 (9) intbb.anIntArray240[10] = 2354; intbb.anIntArray241[10] = 250; intbb.anIntArray272[10] = 155; //Image addSprite(2354, 0, 0, "torag"); //Added 10 controls. }

find aclass44 = aClass44
and under it add

bb(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);

Havn’t put any effort into this so dont say its shit its just for new people to add.

Picture.

[/quote]

Lol why do you have a “x” and a 'Decline" button?[/quote]
